lines.speaker: Mr. Horns
lines.text: Okay class settle down, settle down! We have almost arrived at our field trip destination!

lines.speaker: Mr. Horns
lines.text: Can anyone guess where we are going?

lines.speaker: Wendy
lines.text: An amusement park!

lines.speaker: Mr. Horns
lines.text: Nope, more informational!

lines.speaker: Ryan
lines.text: The Science Museum!

lines.speaker: Mr. Horns
lines.text: More hands on!

lines.speaker: Ollie
lines.text: Pile of dirt?!

lines.speaker: Mr. Horns
lines.text: No Ollie, we have that at school! Fine I will tell you…

lines.speaker: Mr. Horns
lines.text: We are going to...

lines.speaker: Mr. Horns
lines.text: A Corn Canning Factory!

lines.speaker: Wendy
lines.text: You have GOT to be kidding.

lines.speaker: Ryan
lines.text: Boring.

lines.speaker: Ollie
lines.text: Dude, a pile of dirt is better than this.

lines.speaker: Penny
lines.text: I bet we will learn a whole bunch! Thank you Mr. Horns!

lines.speaker: Wendy
lines.text: Of course you would like something so boring.

lines.speaker: Mr. Horns
lines.text: Now Penny is right, the trip will be very informational about the work place.

lines.speaker: Mr. Horns
lines.text: Plus we will get to see some very cool machinery in action!

lines.speaker: Ryan
lines.text: (Sign)...

lines.speaker: Ryan
lines.text: I guess robots are cool.

lines.speaker: Mr. Horns
lines.text: Yes they are! Plus they are giving us free corn t-shirts.
FREE! FREE! FREE!

lines.speaker: Poppy
lines.text: I don’t think you are boring.

lines.speaker: Penny
lines.text: Haha thanks Poppy, but it's okay if I am boring. I am happy as I am.

lines.speaker: Poppy
lines.text: Well, I am excited for the field trip, who knows what is in store!

lines.speaker: Tour Guide
lines.text: Uh hi, welcome to Corny Cans Canned Corn.

lines.speaker: Tour Guide
lines.text: We will be giving you a tour of the facility.

lines.speaker: Tour Guide
lines.text: Yeah, Uh... follow me.

lines.speaker: Mr. Horns
lines.text: Alright kids, listen carefully to the worker, he is going to teach you all about how a factory works! Bestow your knowledge to us!

lines.speaker: Tour Guide
lines.text: Uh... right... I guess we can start where we wash the corn.

lines.speaker: Wendy
lines.text: Well, When do we get the free shirts?

lines.speaker: Ryan
lines.text: Where are the robots with guns on them?

lines.speaker: Ollie
lines.text: I just ate some corn I found on the ground. Is that okay?

lines.speaker: Penny
lines.text: Why do you wash the corn Mr. Worker?

lines.speaker: Mr. Horns
lines.text: Great question Penny!

lines.speaker: Tour Guide
lines.text: Because it’s dirty if not.

lines.speaker: Penny
lines.text: Oh.

lines.speaker: Tour Guide
lines.text: Follow me so we can look at things… I guess.
